document.full_text: johnson & johnson  reported stronger-than-expected quarterly earnings, fueled by higher prescription drug sales and stabilizing performance of its consumer products business that has been plagued by recalls.
document.title: j&j beats forecasts despite recalls
lines_and_colors: johnson & johnson  reported stronger-than-expected quarterly earnings, fueled by higher prescription drug sales and stabilizing performance of its consumer products business that has been plagued by recalls.
